name: inphyerse
description:
"under construction" temproray landing page the game inphyerse sumbited for houdini game jam 2022

HOW TO PLAY (important):-

there are 4 kinds of food and 3 machines

drink machine: creates coffee and tea

dough machine:- creates dough for cake and waffle

oven:- bake waffle and cake

use the tool physic to control objects and throw items and open door ,try to save time as much as you can

bonus points for you if you could hit the third arm  joint with the cabients :)
